advancedsearch-desc: D tõe n paama baoob sẽn yaa sõma n paase[[Special:Search]]
advancedsearch-optgroup-text: Bao-y seb-neng ning sẽn be wã pʋgẽ
advancedsearch-field-deepcategory: Pags nins sẽn be kategori wã pʋgẽ
advancedsearch-help-plain: ;Description :Bõn-kãensã baooda sõsdã zug bɩ seb-gʋlsdã pʋgẽ. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã :* Y tõe n kẽnga gom-biis wʋsg pʋgẽ. :* B pa na n bao n bãng sõss nins sẽn be bãnã pʋgẽ wã ye. :* Tõe tɩ y na n paama sõss nins y sẽn bao n pa yãt ye. :* B rɩkda gom-bi-kãnga. Makr: Y sã n gʋls "karo" tɩ b bao n bãng bũmb ning sẽn yaa "karo" wã, y na n baoame me tɩ y bãng bũmb ning b sẽn yeel tɩ "karo". Gom-biig ning sẽn yitẽ wã yaa goam sẽn yaa toor fasɩ. ;Sõng-y n ges-y :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Full_text_search Full text search] ;Syntax -equivalent in the normal search :sesame street car
advancedsearch-help-phrase: B sẽn wilg tɩ b yaa be be be :Bõn-naands pʋga baoosgo. B pa get b sẽn maand bũmb ninsã ye. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã : (b sẽn tõe n maan n wilg tɩ y pa tar sõssã bal n dat n sõsdã, ges makr ning sẽn be ka wã) :* Bɩ y welg sogs-kãensã ne kom bɩ zĩiga, wala: "good morning", "hello friend!". :* B pa na n ges sõss nins sẽn be sõssã pʋgẽ wã ye, la b pa na n tags sõss nins b sẽn gʋls ne sõssã ye (ka b sẽn mak sõssã la kom-n-taarã) ye. :* B sẽn baood bũmb ninsã pa wilgdẽ tɩ b pa segd n maan bũmb sẽn yaa sõma ye. :* Pa rɩkd gom-biis sẽn yitẽ ye. ;Sõng-y n ges-y :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax -equivalent in the normal search :Words in quotation marks, for example "Begin at the beginning".
advancedsearch-help-or: ;Description :Bɩ y yãgs sõss a yembr bɩ a yembr zugẽ. ;Sõng-y n ges-y :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words with OR in between them like Laptop OR Notebook.
advancedsearch-help-not: ;Description :B pa tar sõns nins sẽn tar gom- ye. ;Bãng-y bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã :* B rɩkda gom-biis n dat n wilg b sẽn yaa bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ b gomd n pa le tõe n gom n yeel ye. Wala makre: Y sã n gʋls "karo" tɩ y bao n bãng bũmb ning sẽn yaa "karo" wã, y na n baoame me tɩ y bãng bũmb ning n na n bãng bũmb nins sẽn yaa "kar" wã. Gom-biig ning sẽn yitẽ wã yaa goam sẽn yaa toor fasɩ. ;Sõngr sebre: :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Words.2C_phrases.2C_and_modifiers Words, phrases, and modifiers] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words with - before them, for example -elephant.
advancedsearch-help-intitle: ;Description :Bõn-vẽng sẽn tar gom-biis nins sẽn tar gomdã pʋgẽ baoosgo ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã: :* B rɩkda gom-bi-kãnga. Makr: Y sã n gʋls "karo" tɩ b bao n bãng bũmb ning sẽn yaa "karo" wã, y na n baoame me tɩ y bãng bũmb ning b sẽn yeel tɩ "karo". Gom-biig ning sẽn yitẽ wã yaa goam sẽn yaa toor fasɩ. ;Sõng-y n ges-y :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Intitle_and_incategory Intitle and incategory] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words withuntitle:before them likeintitle:queen.
advancedsearch-help-subpageof: ;B sẽn wilg tɩ b yaa :Bõn-yẽng sẽn yaa seb-neng ning sẽn be seb-kãngã pʋgẽ wã baoob. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã :* Y tõe n baooga seb-yẽng a ye bal n pa tõe n paam n paam n bãng ye. :* Da yĩm n bas n sak n kɩt tɩ b yãk yʋy zĩiga b sẽn dat n bao n na n tõog n bao-b-la a pʋgẽ. :* Da sak n tall yʋy zĩiga sẽn be seb-kãngã taoor ye:{{ns: project}}:Redirect. ;Sõng-y n tool y neda: :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#subpageof subpageof search] ;Syntax -equivalent in the normal search :subpageof:followed by a page name like Subpageof: Redirect. Use double quotes if the parent page contains spaces:subpageof:"Requests for comment".
advancedsearch-help-deepcategory: ;Description :Wilgdg-y sɛb nins sẽn be kategori wã la a pʋ-bĩisã pʋgẽ wã. ;Bãng-y bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã :* Yaa pipi sull-rɩtg a nu bal la y na n bao n na n yã. :* B sẽn yãkd-b n naan yɩ neb 256 wã. :* Y tõe n baoo seb-kãens zĩis wʋsgo. ; Sõng-y n ges-y :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Deepcategory Deepcategory] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search: deepcategory: followed by a category name like deepcategory:Help. Use double quotes if the name contains spaces: deepcategory:"Hidden categories".
advancedsearch-help-hastemplate: ;Description :Bõn-vẽng sẽn tar makr-kãensã n baood sɛb-kãense. ;Y sã n dat n bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã, y tõe n yãa makr-dãmb sẽn tar bũmbu (dãmb sẽn naag ne makr-dãmbã). :* Sẽn maand tɩ b rat n wilg tɩ b pa tõe n maan bũmb a to wã, b tõe n yãenda makr-bilb b sẽn sɩng ne b baoobã. Wala makre, b baood "com..." n na n wilg tɩ yaa "bõn-naands" la pa "bõn na n yɩ "bõn sẽn yaa b toor-toorã" ye. ;Sõng sebre :[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Hastemplate Hastemplate] ;Syntax-equivalent in the normal search :Words in quotation marks withHastemplate:before them likehastemplate:"missing information".
advancedsearch-help-inlanguage: Description: Y na n baooda koe-moonegã ne y sẽn datã buud-gomdã bal. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã:* Y tõe n baoo sɛb buud-gomd a ye bala. :*Tõnd sã n dat n bãng zĩiga, yaa wiki rãmb nins sẽn tar translatewiki extensionã n tõe n yã-a wã bal la b na n yã-yã. ; Sõng seb-neng: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Inlanguage Inlanguage];Syntax-tõnd sẽn yaa ne baoosã pʋgẽ:sẽn-bɩɩs: sẽn tũ ne goam kood wala sẽns:es. Y tõe n basa buud-goamã y sẽn na n paasd - sẽn be y sẽn dat n yeelã taoor, wala makre: -inlanguage:en.
advancedsearch-help-filetype: B sẽn wilg tɩ b yaa :Bõn-vẽendb nins sẽn yãkd-b wã bal n baooda. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã:* Y tõe n baooda faayl buud a ye bala. :* Y tõe n yãka koe-biis nins y sẽn yã wã bal n yit sõsg sẽn yiidã pʋgẽ. ;Sẽ-bɩg-y n ges-y:[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#filetype Filetype] la [https:// www.mediawiki .org/wiki /Special: MyLanguage /Help:SirrusSearches#filemime filemime];Syntax-yell-yell ne baoosg sẽn yaa to-to:Sẽ-rɩtg-yell:Words with filetybe: b taoor wala filetype:ogg.
advancedsearch-help-filew: Description:Sẽn yaa zĩ-kãens n kɩt tɩ y tõe n wilg sɛbã zãadmã. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã:* Yaa faayl buud nins sẽn tar sẽk la b sẽn tar n zãadã bal la rẽ segd n maana, wala vide wã la fotã. ;Tãagrã sõngre:[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Tãagre:CirrusSearch#File_measuresTãagri:Tãagr sõngre];Tãag-n-taagrã pʋgẽ:Tãaga ne filew sẽn be b taoore wala filw:>800.
advancedsearch-help-fileh: Description:Sẽn yaa zĩ-kãens n kɩt tɩ y tõe n wilg sɛb-kãnga sẽn ta zĩig ninga. ;Bɩ y bãng bũmb nins sẽn pʋgdã:* Yaa faayl buud nins sẽn tar sẽk la b sẽn tar n zãadã bal la rẽ segd n maana, wala vide wã la fotã. ;Tãagrã sõngre:[https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Tãagre:CirrusSearch#File_measuresTãagri-measures];Tãagr sẽn yaa a yembr ne a taab n baoodẽ:Bãngr sẽn tar fileh n be b taoore wala fileh:>600.
advancedsearch-help-sort: Description:Bɩ y toeem y sẽn maandẽ wã pʋga. Yaa noy ning sẽn kɩt tɩ b yãkd seb-kãens n paas seb-kãens fãa. ; Sõng seb-neng: [https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Help:CirrusSearch#Explicit_sort_orders Sõng sor sor sor sor sõor sẽn yaa vẽenega];Syntax-walg ne baoos sẽn yaa to-to: Sõng-kãngã pa tar gom-bil sẽn tõe n tall yãmb n gʋls baoosã pʋga, bala, b wilga tʋʋm-kãng ne paramɛt sẽn be URL wã pʋgẽ ye.
advancedsearch-inlanguage-default: Sõng-y buud-gomd ning sẽn be wã
advancedsearch-filetype-section-types: Sõng-y buud-gomd ning sẽn be wã
advancedsearch-sort-relevance: D sẽn segd n maan bũmb ningã
advancedsearch-sort-last-edit-asc: Yãk-y n tool-y neda Yãk a soaba
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-asc: B naan-a-la ne a sẽn yaa-a pĩnd n yɩɩdã
advancedsearch-sort-create-timestamp-des: B naan-a-la ne a sẽn yaa-a pĩnd n yɩɩdã
advancedsearch-sort-preview-last-edit-as: sẽn pa kaoos n lebg n lebg
advancedsearch-sort-preview-create-times: sẽn naan wa n pa kaoos
advancedsearch-namespaces-remember: Tẽeg-y tɩ b yãk-y n na n bao n bãng-y bũmb ning sẽn na n yɩlẽ n bao n paase
advancedsearch-namespaces-pane-preview-l: B sẽn tʋmd taab n dat n wilg b sẽn dat n maan bũmb ninsã
advancedsearch-namespaces-preset-default: Dɩlla sẽn pa tõe n maan bũmb ye
prefs-advancedsearch: Bao-y n bãng-y bũmb nins sẽn yaa sõma n paase
advancedsearch-preference-help: Sẽn paase, b paasda form n paas seb-kãngã. Woto kɩtame tɩ y tõe n bao n bãng bũmb sẽn yaa sõma, baa y sã n pa mi baoobã sẽn yaa sõma ye. A leb n toeemda b sẽn tõe n yãk yʋy zĩiga to-to wã.
advancedsearch-preference-disable: Da wilg-y Advanced Search sõorã n na n tũnug ne Special:Search ye
